item.title: Find out what is behind Ayahuasca that natives call sacred
item.description:
Find out what is behind Ayahuasca that natives call sacred

Colombia is one of the region's fastest growing tourist destinations. In 2014, more than four million foreigners enjoyed its diverse landscapes, its colonial cities, beach sites section of the Amazon rain forest and more.

item.title: Demystifying The Dietary Recommendations Prior To An Ayahuasca Ceremony - Reset.me
item.description:
Demystifying The Dietary Recommendations Prior To An Ayahuasca Ceremony - Reset.me

You've felt the call and have decided that working with ayahuasca will be an invaluable tool for your spiritual growth and development. One of the key considerations that factors directly into the fabric of an ayahuasca experience is dietary preparation. Reset contributor Dale Richardson, Ph.D.

item.title: Do Entities From Another Universe Inhabit the Brains of Psychedelic DMT Users?
item.description:
Do Entities From Another Universe Inhabit the Brains of Psychedelic DMT Users?

Have you encountered stick men, machine elves or other discarnate entities while tripping brains on DMT? If so, you're not alone. The use of the powerful, fast-acting psychedelic dimethyltriptamine (DMT) generates reports of such entities on a regular basis.

item.title: Amazon leaders and academics denounce ayahuasca rituals led by outsiders
item.description:
Amazon leaders and academics denounce ayahuasca rituals led by outsiders

BOGOT√Å, Colombia - Among indigenous peoples from the upper Amazon in South America, views on outsiders participating in rituals involving ayahuasca - the medicinal plant and the hallucinogenic drink made from it - vary. But even those who are more welcoming believe some ayahuasca tourists diverge too far from tradition, putting themselves and others at risk.

item.title: Shocking statement made by two renowned scientists: death does not exist
item.description:
Shocking statement made by two renowned scientists: death does not exist

What happens after we die? Is death the end of everything or is there any life after death? I think many of us have been curious about this at least once in our lifetime. Two researchers specialized in quantum physics state that they can prove the existence of life after death and the soul.

item.title: Supper with the Psychedelic Society - tales of therapy, poetry and ayahuasca
item.description:
Supper with the Psychedelic Society - tales of therapy, poetry and ayahuasca

Amid an abundance of food and drink, flickering candles and a heady air of altered states,100 or so people in north London's New Unity church watched John, a mop-haired Irishman in his late 20s, tell the story of how he learned to love through therapy, poetry and ayahuasca.

item.title: Shaman Explains How Ayahuasca Can Facilitate A Spiritual Awakening
item.description:
Shaman Explains How Ayahuasca Can Facilitate A Spiritual Awakening

Ayahuasca has been used in religious ceremonies for centuries. Called the "vine of the soul," ayahuasca is a brew typically made from the Banisteriopsis caapi vine and Psychotria viridis leavesthat grow predominantly in Brazil, Peru and other regions of South America.

item.title: Disturbing truth about hallucinogenic plant lapped up by backpackers
item.description:
Disturbing truth about hallucinogenic plant lapped up by backpackers

Ayahuasca, a hallucinogenic tea, draws tourists to South American retreats It has even become popular at parties and cleansing weekends in the UK But two travellers have died after taking part in the ceremony since 2014 Brazilian families have come forward to share their own tales of horror The tea is used by a religious sect, but many describe watching their loved ones descend into madness before killing themselves or simply vanishing It is the mind-bending brew which has brought backpackers and gap year students flocking to the jungles of South America in ever greater numbers.
